definition: (old) works of literature, including novels, plays etc
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The Manchu narration-chant story-telling has been basically handed down generation after generation by mouth and ear.
sentences.chinese: 滿族講唱說部主要在氏族內以口耳相傳，代代承繼。
